DataElement.preferredName: Person Supplement Oxygen Use Quantity Stable Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Yes/No indicator for the stability of the amount of supplemental oxygen a person uses.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Supplement Oxygen Use Quantity Stable
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the stability of the amount of supplemental oxygen a person uses.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being.:Something added to complete a thing, make up for a deficiency, or extend or strengthen the whole; serving to complete or make an addition.:use this term only for elemental or gaseous oxygen (02); for other compounds see OXYGEN COMPOUND.

Concepts.definition: Something added to complete a thing, make up for a deficiency, or extend or strengthen the whole; serving to complete or make an addition.
An element with atomic symbol O, atomic number 8, and atomic weight 16.

Property.preferredDefinition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:Stable; subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.

Concepts.definition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
Subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
